# FlowBoard Support

Welcome to FlowBoard support! We're here to help you get the most out of your task management experience.

## üìö Getting Help

### Before Opening an Issue

1. **Check existing issues:** Your question might already be answered
2. **Review the in-app tutorial:** Settings ‚Üí View Tutorial
3. **Check common questions below**

### How to Get Support

1. **[Open a Support Issue](https://github.com/prajwalgajakesari/flowboard/issues/new?template=support.md)** - For questions about using FlowBoard
2. **[Report a Bug](https://github.com/prajwalgajakesari/flowboard/issues/new?template=bug_report.md)** - For technical issues or bugs
3. **[Request a Feature](https://github.com/prajwalgajakesari/flowboard/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)** - For new feature ideas

---

## ‚ùì Common Questions

### General Usage

**Q: How do I create a task?**
A: Tap the + button in any column (To Do, In Progress, Blocked, or Done) and fill in the task details.

**Q: How do I move tasks between columns?**
A: Long-press and drag a task to another column. Release to drop it in the new status.

**Q: How do I edit a task?**
A: Tap on any task to open the detail view where you can edit all fields.

**Q: How do I delete a task?**
A: Swipe left on a task or tap the task and use the delete button in the detail view.

### Focus Timer

**Q: How do I use the Pomodoro timer?**
A:
1. Tap the timer icon in the top navigation
2. Select a task from the list (optional)
3. Choose Work, Short Break, or Long Break
4. Tap Start

**Q: How do I customize timer durations?**
A: Tap the gear icon ‚Üí Timer Settings ‚Üí Adjust durations for Work, Short Break, and Long Break

**Q: Does the timer work in the background?**
A: Yes! The timer continues running even when you switch apps or lock your iPad.

### Widgets

**Q: How do I add a widget to my home screen?**
A:
1. Long-press on an empty area of your home screen
2. Tap the + button in the top-left corner
3. Search for "FlowBoard"
4. Choose a widget size (Small, Medium, or Large)
5. Tap "Add Widget"

**Q: Why isn't my widget updating?**
A: Widgets update automatically, but you can force a refresh by removing and re-adding the widget.

### Share Extension

**Q: How do I create tasks from other apps?**
A:
1. In Safari, Notes, or any app with share functionality
2. Tap the Share button
3. Scroll down and select "FlowBoard"
4. Fill in task details and save

**Q: What can I share to FlowBoard?**
A: URLs, text, and any content that supports the iOS share sheet.

### Notifications

**Q: How do I enable task reminders?**
A:
1. Create or edit a task
2. Set a due date
3. FlowBoard will automatically remind you 1 day and 1 hour before the deadline
4. Make sure notifications are enabled in iOS Settings ‚Üí FlowBoard

**Q: I'm not receiving notifications. What should I do?**
A:
1. Go to iOS Settings ‚Üí FlowBoard ‚Üí Notifications
2. Ensure "Allow Notifications" is enabled
3. Check that you've set due dates on your tasks

### Data & Privacy

**Q: Where is my data stored?**
A: All your task data is stored locally on your iPad. FlowBoard does not send any data to external servers.

**Q: How do I backup my tasks?**
A: Use the Data Export feature: Tap the gear icon ‚Üí Data Management ‚Üí Export Tasks. Choose JSON, CSV, or Markdown format.

**Q: Can I sync my tasks across devices?**
A: Currently, FlowBoard stores data locally only. Cloud sync may be added in a future version.

**Q: How do I delete all my data?**
A: Tap the gear icon ‚Üí Data Management ‚Üí Delete All Tasks. This action cannot be undone.

**Q: What happens to my data if I uninstall the app?**
A: All data is permanently deleted when you uninstall FlowBoard. Make sure to export your tasks first if needed.

### Features

**Q: What are the different priority levels?**
A: Tasks can be marked as High (red), Medium (orange), or Low (gray) priority.

**Q: How do I use tags?**
A: When creating or editing a task, type tags separated by commas in the Tags field. Tap the filter icon to filter tasks by tag.

**Q: What are subtasks?**
A: Subtasks let you break down complex tasks into smaller steps. Add them in the task detail view.

**Q: How do I see statistics?**
A: Tap the chart icon in the top navigation to view your productivity statistics and task completion trends.

## üêõ Found a Bug?

If you've encountered a bug, please [report it here](https://github.com/prajwalgajakesari/flowboard/issues/new?template=bug_report.md) with:
- A clear description
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Your device model and iOS version
- Screenshots if possible
